articles.description: Marcus Fakana has been jailed for a year over the relationship, a campaign group in Dubai says.

articles.description: Sara Sharif was sassy, bubbly and dreamed of being on X-factor - but behind closed doors she was brutally beaten.

articles.description: Lindsay MacCallum stole £86,000 from Rainbow Valley, set up in memory of her  friend's daughter who died of cancer.

articles.description: Satellite images show Russian ships off the Syrian coast, as Moscow mulls its military future after Bashar al-Assad's fall.

articles.description: During multiple raids on Rasikh Malik's property, officers failed to find the family. But he was the one who hid them.

articles.description: Women experiencing conditions such as heavy periods and endometriosis are being dismissed when they ask for help, a report warns.
articles.title: Medical misogyny leaves women in pain for years, say MPs

articles.description: Lord Hendy says the transport department is going to "keep a close watch on staffing" over the festive period.
